api::SObject Class Reference
Inheritance diagram for api::SObject:

Documentation

The SObject is the base object for most classes in the Stratify API.

It is a simple object that allows the inheriting class to set an error or halt the program if it encouters a fatal problem.

Member Function Documentation

const char* api::SObject::api_version ( ) const
inline

Returns a pointer to a string that shows the API version.

void api::SObject::clear_error ( ) const
inline

Clears the current error.

int api::SObject::error_number ( ) const
inline

Returns the error number.

If the error number is zero. There is no error.

If the error number is greater than zero. It indicates an error indicator from the standard C library (such as ENOENT).

If the error number is less than zero, it refers to a StratifyAPI defined error like ERROR_NONE.

void api::SObject::set_error_number ( int  value) const
inlineprotected

Sets the error number.

Parameters
valueThe value to assign to the error number.
